review_text: Absolutely love this shirt! The quality is amazing and it fits perfectly. True to size and the fabric is so soft. Will definitely buy more colors!
Very disappointed. The shirt arrived with a hole in it and the color looks nothing like the picture. Requested a refund immediately.
Good quality shirt, but runs a bit small. I'd recommend ordering one size up. The material is nice and soft though.
Best earbuds I've ever owned! The sound quality is incredible and battery life lasts all day. Pairing was super easy too.
Sound quality is okay but one earbud stopped working after just 2 weeks. Customer service was unhelpful when I tried to get a replacement.
Decent earbuds for the price. Connection drops occasionally but overall they work fine. Nothing special but not terrible either.
This serum is a game changer! My skin has never looked better. No irritation and it absorbs quickly. Highly recommend for dry skin.
Caused terrible breakouts on my sensitive skin. Had to stop using after 3 days. Very disappointing for the price.
Good serum, nice texture and pleasant scent. Haven't seen dramatic results yet but my skin feels more hydrated.
Perfect water bottle! Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours. No leaks and the design is sleek. Worth every penny.
Arrived dented and scratched. The packaging was terrible - just thrown in a box with no protection. Disappointed.
Great bottle, keeps water cold all day. A bit heavy but that's expected for insulated bottles. Good value.
Worst jeans ever! Size chart is completely wrong. These run at least 2 sizes smaller than advertised. False advertising!
Love these jeans! Perfect fit and great quality denim. The stretch is just right and they look expensive.
Okay jeans, nothing special. Quality is decent but shipping took forever - almost 3 weeks to arrive.
Amazing smartwatch! The display is gorgeous and all features work perfectly. Battery lasts 4 days. Best purchase this year.
Screen cracked within a month of normal use. For this price, I expected better durability. Returning for refund.
Great smartwatch overall. Setup was a bit confusing at first but once configured, it works beautifully. Good value.
This cream is fantastic! My dark spots have faded significantly after just 4 weeks. Will repurchase for sure.
Strong chemical smell and caused redness. Product quality doesn't match the premium price at all.
Good cream, absorbs well and doesn't feel greasy. Subtle improvement in skin brightness. Would recommend.
Terrible quality! Lost its shape after one week and smells strongly of chemicals. Complete waste of money.
Best pillow ever! Finally sleeping through the night. Perfect firmness and no neck pain anymore.
Average pillow. A bit too firm for my liking but shipping was fast. May need time to break in.
Comfortable shoes for running! Good cushioning and breathable material. Only complaint is the sizing runs slightly large.
Perfect running shoes! Light as a feather and super comfortable. My new go-to for marathon training.
Sole started coming apart after just 2 months. Expected better durability from a premium brand. Customer support was slow.
Lifesaver! Charges my phone 5 times over. Fast charging works great. Compact design fits in my pocket.
Works as expected but heavier than advertised. Charges devices well but not great for travel due to weight.
Stopped working after 1 month. Tried contacting customer service but no response. Avoid this product!
Miracle cream! Reduced my fine lines visibly in 3 weeks. Gentle formula, no irritation. Worth the investment.
Caused puffy eyes and irritation. Had to discontinue use. Not suitable for sensitive skin despite claims.
Nice eye cream, absorbs quickly without being greasy. Haven't seen dramatic results but feels luxurious.
Best purchase for my home! Cleans thoroughly and the app control is fantastic. My floors have never been cleaner.
Terrible! Gets stuck constantly and the suction is weak. Customer service refused my return request.
Decent vacuum for the price. Does an okay job on hard floors but struggles with carpet. Battery life could be better.
Beautiful coat! Great quality wool and keeps me warm. True to size and elegant design. Shipping was a bit slow.
Perfect winter coat! Exceptional quality and craftsmanship. The inner lining is super soft. Love it!
Color is completely different from photos - looks cheap in person. Material feels scratchy. Very misleading listing.
Incredible headphones! The noise cancellation is outstanding and sound quality rivals brands costing twice as much.
Great headphones overall. Comfortable for long use and good battery life. ANC could be stronger but still impressed.
Bluetooth keeps disconnecting randomly. Had to return twice. Quality control seems to be an issue with this product.
Love these lip balms! All-natural ingredients and they actually work. Lips have never been softer. Great value for a 4-pack.
Nice lip balms but nothing extraordinary. Pleasant scents but effectiveness wears off quickly. Average product.
Two out of four arrived broken/melted. Packaging needs improvement. Very disappointing quality control.
Lovely mugs! Nice design and perfect size for morning coffee. Well-packaged and arrived without any damage.
Beautiful mug set! Excellent quality ceramic and dishwasher safe. Makes my morning coffee feel special.
One mug had a crack and another has an uneven bottom. Quality control issues for what should be premium mugs.
Gorgeous bag! Real leather and beautiful craftsmanship. Gets compliments everywhere I go. Worth the investment.
Nice bag, good quality leather. Smaller than expected but still functional. Fast shipping and well-packaged.
Not real leather despite description! This is clearly synthetic. False advertising. Demanding full refund.
Excellent webcam! Crystal clear video quality and great for work meetings. Easy plug and play setup.
Average webcam. Video quality is decent but microphone picks up too much background noise. Needs improvement.
Poor quality in low light conditions. Grainy video and autofocus constantly hunting. Not worth the price.
Best shampoo I've used! Hair feels amazing after first wash. Love that it's organic and cruelty-free.
Nice shampoo, pleasant scent and lathers well. Hair feels clean and soft. Would buy again.
Made my hair very dry and tangled. Not suitable for all hair types despite claims. Disappointed.
Beautiful cutting boards! Sustainable bamboo and very durable. Perfect addition to my kitchen.
Good quality boards. Nice size variety in the set. Arrived with minor scratch but still functional.
Okay cutting boards. Smaller than expected based on photos. Quality is decent but nothing special.
Most comfortable yoga pants ever! Perfect for workouts and lounging. True to size and flattering fit.
Great yoga pants. Good quality fabric that doesn't go see-through. Squat-proof and comfortable.
Sizing is completely off. Ordered my usual size and these are way too tight. Material feels cheap.
Perfect desk lamp! Multiple brightness levels and color temperatures. Eye-friendly and stylish design.
Good lamp overall. USB charging port is convenient. Only wish the brightness went a bit higher.
Lamp flickered from day one and died within a week. Terrible quality. Don't waste your money.
Gorgeous colors! Long-lasting formula that doesn't chip for days. My new favorite nail polish brand.
Nice colors but formula is quite thick. Needs to be applied thin or it gets goopy. Average quality.
Colors don't match the swatches shown. Very misleading. Also chips easily within 2 days.
Love this diffuser! Creates a relaxing atmosphere and runs quietly. Timer function is very convenient.
Nice diffuser, good mist output. Design looks elegant. Wish the water tank was a bit larger.
Started leaking after 2 weeks. Water got everywhere and damaged my furniture. Very disappointed.
Absolutely stunning scarf! The silk quality is exceptional and the colors are vibrant. A true luxury item.
Beautiful scarf, elegant and versatile. Quality is good but shipping took longer than expected.
Nice scarf but edges are not perfectly finished. Expected better for a designer item. Still pretty though.
Best gaming mouse! Super responsive and the RGB lighting is amazing. Customizable buttons are perfect for gaming.
Great mouse for gaming. Comfortable grip and smooth glide. Software could be more intuitive though.
Scroll wheel broke after 3 weeks. For a gaming mouse at this price point, quality should be much better.
Game changer for my skincare! Face feels so clean and products absorb better. Gentle on sensitive skin.
Good cleansing brush. Nice variety of brush heads. Battery life is decent. Satisfied with purchase.
Caused skin irritation even on lowest setting. Too harsh for sensitive skin. Had to stop using.
Excellent skillet! Cooks evenly and perfect sear on steaks. Already becoming my most-used pan.
Great skillet, heavy but heats evenly. Came pre-seasoned which is convenient. Worth the investment.
Good pan but extremely heavy. Harder to maneuver than expected. Seasoning was spotty in places.
Luxurious sweater! So soft and warm. True to size and elegant style. Perfect for fall/winter.
Beautiful sweater. Quality cashmere and cozy fit. Only downside is it sheds a little initially.
Not real cashmere! This is mostly acrylic blend. False advertising at premium price. Terrible.
Best keyboard for typing! Cherry MX switches feel amazing. Build quality is exceptional.
Great mechanical keyboard. Keys are responsive and satisfying. A bit loud for office use though.
Spacebar makes annoying rattling sound. For this price, quality control should be better.
Best sunscreen ever! No white cast and feels lightweight. Doesn't irritate my sensitive skin.
Good sunscreen, absorbs quickly. Pleasant scent and doesn't break me out. Will repurchase.
Leaves terrible white cast on darker skin tones. Not inclusive at all. Very disappointing.
Amazing smart home device! Easy installation and energy savings are noticeable. App works great.
Decent thermostat. Works as expected but setup was complicated. Could use better instructions.
WiFi constantly disconnects. Useless as a smart device if it can't stay connected. Returning it.
Perfect workout shorts! Lightweight, breathable, and pockets are deep enough for phone. Love them!
Great shorts for gym. Good quality and comfortable. Run slightly long but still work well.
Okay shorts. Material is thinner than expected. Pockets are nice though. Decent for the price.
Exactly what I needed! All ports work perfectly and it's compact. Great for my desk setup.
